Reviews.Title: “Great price and location, but rock hard beds”

Reviews.Content: wife looking cheap crash evening london quick internet search £75 2 people decent breakfast included blocks west hard argue plenty clean decent condition okay bed lamp missing lampshade otherwise exceeded expectations shower strong hot downer bed simply rock hard comfortable nights sleep

Reviews.Title: “book a well rated hostel instead”

Reviews.Content: hotel extremely dirty curtains dirty sticky grey carpet bed sheets table cloth breakfast stains furniture bad condition bathroom smelly humid single stayed space properly suitcase reception staff polite bothered help stay 3 times hotel months cancelled reservations staying 1 time location indeed lots accomodations definitely recommended wish basic comfort

Reviews.Title: “Very good priced accomodation for location in London”
Reviews.Author: Angela W
Reviews.Content: read reviews nervous staying location price fantastic night wont hurt bed crash sightseeing night hotel staff ok special clean size plenty hot water shower days central heating chilly weekend breakfast ok value money tasted nice 1 nights stay complain paid budget price budget hotel 5 mins walk oxford street 15 mins soho location fantastic highly recommend staying 1 night weekend trip sightseeing etc

Reviews.Title: “about what you would expect for the price”

Reviews.Content: hotel prices central london ridiculously 90 pounds night single youre fancy plus location convenient tube lines minutes walk oxford circus staff friendly attentive comes free breakfast cheap wifi 5 pounds day en suite bathshower tiny poorly insulated sound 2 neighboring addition fire door 3 top level damper resulting loud bang avery time didnt mind 2 additional flights stairs beyond lift stop crammed little tight little jaded paint peeling worn carpets slight musty smell unfortunately stayed worse time stay london ill check astor court door hotel looked little spacious date 10 pounds night overall stay options

Reviews.Content: read negative comments hotel ok savoy clean quiet comfortable booked stay october 2011 time booked hadnt read poor reviews days arrived entered trepidation expecting creaking doors cobwebs howling background complete crap basic 2 star hotel central london yes entirely adequate london dont spend time hotel rest weary feet sleep overindulgence london pubs anyway completely adequate reasonably priced convenient dont expect ok

Reviews.Title: “Not sure what all the complaining is about?”

Reviews.Content: booked stay hotel night boyfriend blood brothers booking look reviews concerned staying hotel negative comments late cancel wish hadnt worried arrived staff desk helpful informed breakfast etc stayed double floor wasnt comments double bed wardrobes desk sink television hairdryer fridge tea coffee facilities bathroom tiny toilet shower cubicle bed bugs extremely clean tidy breakfast lovely english staff nice paid £89 breakfast included im else people expect price location

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all costs, read the reviews !”
Reviews.Author: Outlook101
Reviews.Content: short stay near broadcasting house read reviews negative sit notice scruffy hotel dingy corridors flap outside mushroom growing clean staff neither friendly unfriendly money stay soon checked breakfast declined egg grossly overdone sausage dry heard reheated microwave stay free

Reviews.Title: “Last minute rip off”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights booked short notice remaining close future ill inclined little travel unfriendly staff 2 night stay lift size shoe box safe looking stairs 4th floor time barely space changed sitting yellow stained toiled seat shower space yes bed spread dirty cup unwashed kettle belong base sink cleaned hugely disappointing severly priced reading reviews choose stay due late bookings reccommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “This is squalor not a hotel !”

Reviews.Content: booked 22 daughter night short notice lateroomscom advertised 3 cupboard unmade dirty bed unflushed soiled toilet sink spat toothpaste ignorant guy reception refused refund money daughter staying soon threatened call police taking money false pretence writing lateroomscom recommend hotel list

Reviews.Title: “Hellish Hallam”

Reviews.Content: wife received hospital appointment days notice urgently required accomodation despite comprehensive search search engines hotel hotel available via travel republic paid £200 double told £35 discount 19 fourth floor concerned fire frankly slept park bench pokey dirty straw mini bar cold drink empty apart occupants half eaten dinner shower useless impossible wash properly frankly cant bothered avoid total rip
